hero.title: Gabriela is a UX/UI Designer and Developer
hero.description: Specializes in developing intuitive and engaging digital experiences, with a strong focus on user-centered design.

quote.text: It's life that matters, nothing but life—the process of discovering, the everlasting and perpetual process, not the discovery itself, at all.
quote.author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky, The Idiot

about.title: about
description: I’m a developer based in New Jersey, USA. I develop intuitive, accessible websites and transform them into modern user-friendly web experiences.

My passion for exploring the intersection of technology, human-computer interaction, and cognitive science has deepened over the past couple of years. Currently, I am pursuing a master's degree at Georgia Tech, where I actively apply the cutting-edge concepts I learn to enhance my professional projects.

contacts.title: contacts
contacts.text: I’m interested in freelance opportunities. However, if you questions, comments, or concerns, don’t hesitate to reach out!
